title: School People Leader
description: Demonstrated leadership and organizational skills by leading and coordinating student activities.

title: Top 10 Rank in Public Board Examination
description: Secured 9th place in the public board examinations, reflecting strong academic performance and consistency.

title: Front-End Development Internship Completion
description: Successfully completed a front-end development internship at CodeAlpha, building responsive web applications and earning certification for performance and contribution.

title: CSI Executive Member
description: Actively organized and managed a technical event named TechDays, contributing to planning, coordination, and execution of college-level technical activities.

title: NPTEL Top Score Achiever
description: Secured a top score in the NPTEL examination, demonstrating strong conceptual understanding and academic excellence.

title: Smart India Hackathon Internal Shortlist
description: Shortlisted during the internal college-level Smart India Hackathon selection for proposing innovative and problem-solving driven technical solutions.
